headline: Align Technology (ALGN) Slid as Demand Rebound Expectations Fell Short
summary: Meridian Funds, managed by ArrowMark Partners, released its “Meridian Growth Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equities hit a record high in the third quarter, fueled by continued gains in technology and falling bond yields. Easing tariff rhetoric and renewed AI infrastructure investments boosted large tech stocks. […]
